mapper.select: select id, classroom_name, content, classroom_num, sort_no, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, version, del_flag from t_school_classroom where classroom_name like CONCAT("%",#{classroomName},"%")
mapper.insert: insert into t_school_classroom (id, classroom_name, content, classroom_num, create_time, create_by, version, del_flag) values (#{id}, #{classroomName}, #{content}, #{classroomNum}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{version}, #{delFlag})
